welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Lapu-Lapu! Known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and vibrant culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful time discovering the beauty of Lapu-Lapu City!
